oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Roy Acuff and Wesley Rose Interview by Chet Hagan in 1980 Side Two
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: The recording is an interview of Roy Acuff and Wesley Rose by Chet Hagan. The recording takes place on November 14th, 1980.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Roy Acuff; Wesley Rose;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Side Two - (0:05) -- Roy Acuff continues discussion about visiting with the United States Airforce and Army. (0:27) -- Roy Acuff discusses playing a christmas show before or after Bob Hope. (1:38) -- Roy Acuff mentions being offered to eat with the army's officers but says he preferred to eat with the regular troops. (2:06) -- Chet Hagan changes the subject to asking Roy Acuff about his experience with other entertainers outside of country music. (4:35) -- Chet Hagan asks Roy Acuff about running for governor. (7:16) -- Roy Acuff discusses that he is glad that he wasn't elected to office.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Acuff, Roy; Rose, Wesley;
